li&#123;padding-left:6px&#125;@media (max-width:720px)&#123;.markdown-body h1&#123;font-size:24px&#125;.markdown-body h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><p>这是我参与更文挑战的第17天，活动详情查看： <a href="https://juejin.cn/post/6967194882926444557?utm_campaign=30day&utm_medium=Ccenter&utm_source=20210528" target="_blank">更文挑战</a></p>
<h1 data-id="heading-0">LocalStorage and Event Delegation</h1>
<blockquote>
<p>今天这个模块标题一看就比较重点了，听起来就感觉有点高大上的样子，毕竟，面试必考知识点了，属于老对手了，吃香的很——本地存储。那么对应的今天这个模块要完成的内容肯定就是与之相关的了，大体就可以猜到实践的范围。今天主要完成的是一个类似于 Todo List 的一个模块，当我们输入一个值的时候，点击添加就可以添加这条数据，以此往返，重复输入，并且值不会再每次刷新的时候丢失，先以实践为主吧。</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">一、效果展示</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">1.index-START.html</h3>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/286c2ad8ec3444f8b63a9cd9ec4d7f5b~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="1.gif" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-3">2.index-FINISHED.html</h3>
<p><img src="https://p9-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/c0ec47f4a2d34f78a375a9b8357cfec8~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="2.gif" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">二、实现</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">最终代码</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>LocalStorage</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
</head>
<body>
  <!--
      Fish SVG Cred:
      https://thenounproject.com/search/?q=fish&i=589236
   -->

   <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 512 512" enable-background="new 0 0 512 512" xml:space="preserve"><g><path d="M495.9,425.3H16.1c-5.2,0-10.1,2.9-12.5,7.6c-2.4,4.7-2.1,10.3,0.9,14.6l39,56.4c2.6,3.8,7,6.1,11.6,6.1h401.7   c4.6,0,9-2.3,11.6-6.1l39-56.4c3-4.3,3.3-9.9,0.9-14.6C506,428.2,501.1,425.3,495.9,425.3z M449.4,481.8H62.6L43,453.6H469   L449.4,481.8z"/><path d="M158.3,122c7.8,0,14.1-6.3,14.1-14.1V43.4c0-7.8-6.3-14.1-14.1-14.1c-7.8,0-14.1,6.3-14.1,14.1v64.5   C144.2,115.7,150.5,122,158.3,122z"/><path d="M245.1,94.7c7.8,0,14.1-6.3,14.1-14.1V16.1c0-7.8-6.3-14.1-14.1-14.1C237.3,2,231,8.3,231,16.1v64.5   C231,88.4,237.3,94.7,245.1,94.7z"/><path d="M331.9,122c7.8,0,14.1-6.3,14.1-14.1V43.4c0-7.8-6.3-14.1-14.1-14.1s-14.1,6.3-14.1,14.1v64.5   C317.8,115.7,324.1,122,331.9,122z"/><path d="M9.6,385.2c5.3,2.8,11.8,1.9,16.2-2.2l50.6-47.7c56.7,46.5,126.6,71.9,198.3,71.9c0,0,0,0,0,0   c87.5,0,169.7-36.6,231.4-103.2c5-5.4,5-13.8,0-19.2c-61.8-66.5-144-103.2-231.4-103.2c-72,0-142.2,25.6-199,72.5l-50-47.1   c-4.4-4.1-10.9-5-16.2-2.2c-5.3,2.8-8.3,8.7-7.4,14.6l11.6,75L2.2,370.6C1.3,376.5,4.2,382.4,9.6,385.2z M380.9,230.8   c34.9,14.3,67.2,35.7,95.3,63.6c-10.1,10-20.8,19.2-31.9,27.5c-22.4-3.3-29.6-8.8-30.7-9.7c-4-5.7-11.8-7.7-18.1-4.4   c-6.9,3.6-9.5,12.2-5.9,19.1c1.9,3.5,7.3,10.3,22.4,16c-10.1,5.7-20.5,10.7-31.1,15.1C352.4,320.2,352.4,268.6,380.9,230.8z    M36.3,255.6l29.4,27.7c5.3,5,13.6,5.1,19.1,0.3c53.2-47.6,120.7-73.7,190-73.7c26.9,0,53.2,3.9,78.5,11.3   c-29.3,44.6-29.3,102,0,146.6c-25.3,7.4-51.6,11.3-78.5,11.3c-69,0-136.3-26-189.4-73.2c-2.7-2.4-13.4-6.3-19.1,0.3l-30.1,28.3   l5.7-40C42.2,293,36.3,255.6,36.3,255.6z"/><circle cx="398.8" cy="273.8" r="14.1"/></g></svg>

  <div class="wrapper">
    <h2>LOCAL TAPAS</h2>
    <p></p>
    <ul class="plates">
      <li>Loading Tapas...</li>
    </ul>
    <!-- 注意表单的修改 -->
    <form class="add-items" method="post" action="http://abc.com">
      <input type="text" name="item" placeholder="Item Name" required>
      <input type="submit" value="+ Add Item">
    </form>
  </div>

<script>
  const addItems = document.querySelector('.add-items');
  const itemsList = document.querySelector('.plates');
  const items = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("items")) || [];

  function createList(plates = [], platesList) &#123;
    platesList.innerHTML = plates.map((plate, i) => &#123;
      return `
        <li>
          <input type="checkbox" data-index=$&#123;i&#125; id="item$&#123;i&#125;" $&#123;plate.done ? 'checked' : ''&#125; />
          <label for="item$&#123;i&#125;">$&#123;plate.text&#125;</label>
        </li>
      `;
    &#125;).join('');
  &#125;

  createList(items,itemsList);

  function addItem(e)&#123;
    e.preventDefault();
    // let value = this.querySelector("input:first-child").value;
    let input = this.querySelector("[name=item]");
    items.push(&#123; text:input.value,done:false&#125;);  //更新js资料
    localStorage.setItem("items",JSON.stringify(items));  //更新localStorage资料
    this.reset();
    createList(items,itemsList);  //更新画面

&#125;

function toggleItem(e)&#123;
  console.log(e.currentTarget.e.target);
  //避免重复触发，判断是input才处理
  if (!e.target.matches('input')) return; // skip this unless it's an input
  let index = e.target.dataset["index"];
  items[index].done = !items[index].done; //更新js资料
  localStorage.setItem("items",JSON.stringify(items));  //更新localStorage资料
  createList(items,itemsList);  //更新画面
&#125;

addItems.addEventListener('submit', addItem);
itemsList.addEventListener('click', toggleItem);
</script>


</body>
</html>


<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-6">三、总结回顾</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-7">过程分解</h3>
<ol>
<li>实现添加之后的列表</li>
</ol>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">createList</span>(<span class="hljs-params">plates = [], platesList</span>) </span>&#123;
    platesList.innerHTML = plates.map(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">plate, i</span>) =></span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-string">`
        <li>
          <input type="checkbox" data-index=<span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;i&#125;</span> id="item<span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;i&#125;</span>" <span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;plate.done ? <span class="hljs-string">'checked'</span> : <span class="hljs-string">''</span>&#125;</span> />
          <label for="item<span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;i&#125;</span>"><span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;plate.text&#125;</span></label>
        </li>
      `</span>;
    &#125;).join(<span class="hljs-string">''</span>);
  &#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>这里可能稍微比较难理解的就是索引的对应，以及对应的 checkbox 的选中和取消的那个三元运算符，再一个就是 id 的对应了。</p>
<ol start="2">
<li>取出 localStorage 中的内容</li>
</ol>
<p>首先将原作者的最终代码运行以后，输入一条记录，然后按 F12 打开控制台面板，找到 Application 面板，再其左侧的 Storage 下的 localStorage 可以看到一条刚刚输入进去的记录。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/603d9d493639412eb2064c0f56123f53~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="image.png" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>现在先取出一下 localStorage 中的记录。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> addItems = <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.querySelector(<span class="hljs-string">'.add-items'</span>);
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> itemsList = <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.querySelector(<span class="hljs-string">'.plates'</span>);
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> items = <span class="hljs-built_in">JSON</span>.parse(<span class="hljs-built_in">localStorage</span>.getItem(<span class="hljs-string">"items"</span>)) || [];


  createList(items,itemsList);

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>里边的两个参数分别为 <strong>针对的内容</strong> 和 <strong>放置内容的地方</strong>。</p>
<p>现在就已经取到了之前输入的那条记录的内容：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/e1de5a216cbc4ba08b6498c88bf5aa00~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="image.png" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>3.添加条目到列表</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">addItem</span>(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>)</span>&#123;
    e.preventDefault();
    <span class="hljs-comment">// let value = this.querySelector("input:first-child").value;</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> value = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.querySelector(<span class="hljs-string">"[name=item]"</span>).value;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> obj = items.push(&#123; text,<span class="hljs-attr">done</span>:<span class="hljs-literal">false</span>&#125;);  <span class="hljs-comment">//更新js资料</span>
    <span class="hljs-built_in">localStorage</span>.setItem(<span class="hljs-string">"items"</span>,items);  <span class="hljs-comment">//更新localStorage资料</span>
    createList(items,itemsList);  <span class="hljs-comment">//更新画面</span>

&#125;


addItems.addEventListener(<span class="hljs-string">'submit'</span>, addItem);
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>但是如果要是这样去写的话，就会发现，可以添加条目，但是 localStorage 里边是错误的。</p>
<p>所以，应该这样修改：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">addItem</span>(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>)</span>&#123;
    e.preventDefault();
    <span class="hljs-comment">// let value = this.querySelector("input:first-child").value;</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> input = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.querySelector(<span class="hljs-string">"[name=item]"</span>);
    items.push(&#123; <span class="hljs-attr">text</span>:input.value,<span class="hljs-attr">done</span>:<span class="hljs-literal">false</span>&#125;);  <span class="hljs-comment">//更新js资料</span>
    <span class="hljs-built_in">localStorage</span>.setItem(<span class="hljs-string">"items"</span>,<span class="hljs-built_in">JSON</span>.stringify(items));  <span class="hljs-comment">//更新localStorage资料</span>
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.reset();
    createList(items,itemsList);  <span class="hljs-comment">//更新画面</span>

&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><img src="https://p1-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/015e39374db54da7a2affc06c7e87ad8~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="3.gif" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>4.完成模块内容（即存储）</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">toggleItem</span>(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>)</span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(e.currentTarget.e.target);
  <span class="hljs-comment">//避免重复触发，判断是input才处理</span>
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!e.target.matches(<span class="hljs-string">'input'</span>)) <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// skip this unless it's an input</span>
  <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> index = e.target.dataset[<span class="hljs-string">"index"</span>];
  items[index].done = !items[index].done; <span class="hljs-comment">//更新js资料</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">localStorage</span>.setItem(<span class="hljs-string">"items"</span>,<span class="hljs-built_in">JSON</span>.stringify(items));  <span class="hljs-comment">//更新localStorage资料</span>
  createList(items,itemsList);  <span class="hljs-comment">//更新画面</span>
&#125;


itemsList.addEventListener(<span class="hljs-string">'click'</span>, toggleItem);
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>模块内容完成。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">四、重难点</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-9">localStorage</h3>
<p>关于 localStorage 的用法查看 MDN 文档：<a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/Window/localStorage" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/…</a></p>
<p>localStorage的优势</p>
<p>1、localStorage拓展了cookie的4K限制</p>
<p>2、localStorage会可以将第一次请求的数据直接存储到本地，这个相当于一个5M大小的针对于前端页面的数据库，相比于cookie可以节约带宽，但是这个却是只有在高版本的浏览器中才支持的</p>
<p>localStorage的局限</p>
<p>1、浏览器的大小不统一，并且在IE8以上的IE版本才支持localStorage这个属性</p>
<p>2、目前所有的浏览器中都会把localStorage的值类型限定为string类型，这个在对我们日常比较常见的JSON对象类型需要一些转换</p>
<p>3、localStorage在浏览器的隐私模式下面是不可读取的</p>
<p>4、localStorage本质上是对字符串的读取，如果存储内容多的话会消耗内存空间，会导致页面变卡</p>
<p>5、localStorage不能被爬虫抓取到</p>
<p>localStorage与sessionStorage的唯一一点区别就是localStorage属于永久性存储，而sessionStorage属于当会话结束的时候，sessionStorage中的键值对会被清空</p></div>  
</div>
